idea:
Entropy is an innovative company that has disrupted the two wheeler service industry by creating an automatic Express Bike Wash Machine. Our team consists of three alumni of IIT âBombay/IIM- Indore.  The machine is capable of washing even the dirtiest of motorcycle within 2-5 minutes and can wash up to 230 motor cycles in less than 10 hours. We have currently 25 operational stores and plan to add another 500 stores in 2017-2018.  

The Companyâs promoters being bike enthusiasts have developed an automatic bike cleaning system christened âExpress Bike Washâ. This machine is an automatic touchscreen operated system which seeks to bring down the time taken to wash a bike to under 5 minutes. 

The system also has an integrated water recycling unit which thereby helps the system run 24x 7 and also makes it environmental friendly.
name: Entropy Innovations Pvt Ltd

idea:

idea:
‘Adventure Sports, Camping, Travel, Exploration, Nature, Bike Tours, Mountains’, if these words tingle your interests then Raw Escapades is something that you are looking for.


Since 2016 Raw Escapades has served people with all the adrenaline rush people need.


Now we are known to offer Biking tours to Ladakh, Spiti, Meghalaya, Tawang, Rajasthan etc., Campsites to choose from the extreme Chandrataal Lake down to Luxurious and peaceful Beach Camps at Palghar beach and as our background has always been of wildlife photography, we offer the best itineraries and tours for Wildlife Reserves in India. On our path to growth we aim to become a premium brand that is a one stop shop for all adventure activities and travel for India and going forward a GLOBAL BRAND FOR ADVENTURE.
name: Rawescapades Private Limited
